setting.location: Captain's room, Admiral Benbow Inn, Devon

characters.appearance: Blind beggar, elderly, milky white eyes, gaunt face
characters.clothing: Tattered cloak, worn boots, old felt hat
characters.action: Extending bony hand holding small paper

characters.appearance: Sea captain, 50s, face suddenly pale with terror

scene.mainElements: Dimly lit bedroom with blind beggar delivering dreaded black spot to terrified captain, single candle casting dramatic shadows
scene.details: Simple wooden bed with rumpled covers, sea chest in corner, candle on bedside table flickering in draft, black paper with ominous mark visible in beggar's extended palm, captain's hands gripping bedsheets, window rattling in storm
scene.background: Dark corners of room, rain lashing against window panes
scene.atmosphere: Pure terror, supernatural dread, fate closing in, death sentence delivered

composition.cameraAngle: Over beggar's shoulder looking at captain
composition.focus: The black spot in extended hand and captain's horrified face
composition.depth: Beggar's hand with black spot foreground, captain's terrified expression middle ground, storm-darkened window background
